attributes.action: veto Croydon Council's attempt to build an arena in Dingwall Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Croydon Against The Arena (CATARENA) has been set up to oppose Croydon Council's plans for the compulsory purchase of the land adjacent to East Croydon station, and their plans to build an arena on that site.
